ComicInfo.Title: The Wild Hunt!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Wild Hunt!: The Dark Elves try to capture the Casket of Ancient Winters from its new guardian, Roger Willis. Thor helps out. Malekith captures Thor's true (or at least enchanting) lover, Melodi, and threatens to kill her if the Casket is not given up.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:36:41. [Issue ID 39014]
ComicInfo.Characters: Thor (feature),Malekith (villain),Surtur (villain),Master of the Hounds (villain),Dark Elves (villains),Sand Devil (villain),Mr. Strother (guest),Roger Willis (guest),Agnar (guest),Lorelei (villain),Balder (guest)
